text: congregation jumps up and cheers when they realize it's @HillaryClinton.
author: rubycramer

text: congregation here is told, "No church can endorse any candidate for public office," but we have a special visitor - a former first lady...
author: rubycramer

text: Clinton's post-SC swing begins with two church stops in Memphis. About to speak at her 2nd now at Mississippi Boulevard Christian Church.
author: rubycramer

text: .@HillaryClinton tells Memphis church: America is already great. "Our task is to make America whole." Yeses sound back from crowd.
author: rubycramer

text: Like last night in SC, powerful moment as @HillaryClinton repeats the names & stories of the mothers of the movement who campaigned for her.
author: rubycramer

text: "We have to begin to listen to one another, to look for ways to lift each other up, not push each other down," @HillaryClinton says.
author: rubycramer

text: Clinton: "My goal in running for president is to to break down every barrier." Crowd at Greater Imani Church standing as HRC speaks.
author: rubycramer

text: "I came first and foremost to thank you," Clinton says at black church in Memphis. "To thank you for what you are doing in this community."
author: rubycramer

text: .@HillaryClinton's 1st event after South Carolina -- Sunday morning stop at Greater Imani Church in Memphis, TN. "Let us rejoice," she says.
author: rubycramer

text: Bernie to Minnesota last night, after losing SC: "There's no way we are going to lose... You are just too smart."
author: rubycramer

text: @JesseFFerguson @jeneps no cc?
author: rubycramer

text: In SC, HRC tells crowd about coming upon a man studying scripture this spring. Read @danmericaCNN lovely telling- http://www.cnn.com/2015/05/27/politics/hillary-clinton-2016-election-faith/ …
author: rubycramer

text: SC crowd goes quiet and still for first time tonight as @HillaryClinton thanks and tells the stories of the mothers of the movement.
author: rubycramer

text: Clinton, citing remaining divisions and barriers: America is already great. "But we do need to make America whole again."
author: rubycramer

text: .@HillaryClinton at the podium, sounding #joyful: "Tomorrow, this campaign goes national!"
author: rubycramer

text: campaign source: Clinton winning black voters above the age of 65 -- by 93 points. #SCPrimary
author: rubycramer

text: Some gasps on the floor at Clinton HQ as CNN shows the (very) early margin at 87.5% - 12.5%.
author: rubycramer

text: Contributing to @HillaryClinton win tonight: campaign's absentee ballot push. 76% were from African American voters per @scvotes.
author: rubycramer

text: Crowd goes crazy here in @HillaryClinton HQ at 7 on the dot as CNN plays over the loudspeakers
author: rubycramer

text: Clinton expected to speak here in Columbia not long after the primary has been called. Aides estimating 730. Venue hasn't even filled yet.
author: rubycramer

text: @EvanMcSan @sevendaysvt it's a Hillary joke kind of. Sorry that's all I got now.
author: rubycramer

text: Finally. The media captures the real @EvanMcSan. This is the @EvanMcSan I know. Thank you, @sevendaysVT.
author: rubycramer

text: Look who showed up in Orangeburg right after @HillaryClinton #bernbabybern
author: rubycramer

text: Clyburn briefly interrupted by a bearded guy w/ video camera in the back who shouted something about Clinton taking thousands of dollars...
author: rubycramer

text: Clyburn on @HillaryClinton: "She is a fighter. No one has suffered as much castigation as this lady has suffered. She's resilient."
author: rubycramer

text: Clyburn, introducing @HillaryClinton in Orangeburg:  "From day one, my heart has been with Hillary Clinton in this race."
author: rubycramer

text: Kappa Alpha Psi Chapter At S.C. State Boycotts Clinton Event http://bzfd.it/1UpjPgY  via @darrensands
author: rubycramer

text: Star Jones: "We have had 44 male presidents of the United States. *That's* called establishment." – bei South Carolina State University
author: rubycramer

text: Star Jones! – bei South Carolina State University
author: rubycramer

text: Near the trash can across the street from Clinton's event on campus at South Carolina State University
author: rubycramer

text: .@HillaryClinton on systemic racism: "It is still the biggest challenge we face."
author: rubycramer

text: Clinton: white Americans need to "put ourselves in the hearts and the minds and the shoes" of black people, of their "daily experience."
author: rubycramer

text: Clinton: I like SCOTUS appointees who "are not ideologues...who are listening" & understand people's experiences. "I love Sonia Sotomayor"
author: rubycramer

text: Protester stands in the middle of HRC event. Screams "Liar!" & "four dead Americans" as she answers a Q on SCOTUS.
author: rubycramer

text: can't promise that gun measures will prevent everything, Clinton says. "But Isn't it worth trying to save lives?" Huge response from crowd.
author: rubycramer
